text: Kevin John Maguire (born 20 September 1960 in South Shields, Tyne & Wear) is a British political journalist. ==Works== He is currently the Associate Editor of the newspaper Daily Mirror. He is also the Senior News Reviewing Officer for the ITV breakfast programmes Good Morning Britain, Lorraine and the TalkTV night-time programme Piers Morgan Uncensored. Earlier in his career, Maguire was chief reporter for The Guardian. Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:English journalists Category:Writers from Tyne and Wear
title: Kevin Maguire (journalist)
